开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: You have accepted a Quest in a Lobby
column2: 你已经在多人集会中接受了任务

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Followers cannot be edited in this state to prevent desync
column2: 在这种状态下，你无法编辑盟友，以防止失去同步

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Cancel the Quest to edit Followers, then re-post it
column2: 请取消当前任务，编辑好盟友后再参加任务

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Only three Followers will be visible in the sidebar, even if there is room enough for all four.
column2: 就算可以让四个盟友参与任务，任务时，左边的队友栏中也只能显示前三个盟友的名字。

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Unless checked, you can only bring Followers if you have unlocked them for Support Surveys.
column2: 启动该选项后，无论你是否解锁全部盟友，都能选择他们参与任务
允许盟友加入多人集会

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Still exludes Join Requests. Followers must be selected before Quest is posted.
column2: 依旧排除了加入请求，发布任务前必须选择盟友。

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: No Followers in the Coral Palace (as this crashes players without the mod).
column2: 龙宫古城没有盟友（因为这会让没装这个MOD的玩家游戏崩溃）。（就是打风雷神龙的地方）

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Any applied Monster Scaling will stack multiplicatively with Multiplayer Scaling, so adjust that or face a slog.
column2: 任何应用的怪物血量增强都将与多人游戏的怪物血量成倍叠加，因此你最好在下面调整难度，否则会吃瘪。（不调！要的就是这种效果！）

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: WARNING: If there is an communication error that breaks up the Quest, the players will get an infinite load when it ends!
column2: 警告：如果有连接错误导致任务中断，玩家将在任务结束时获得无限负载！
允许盟友加入斗技场/挑战任务

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Followers will only be allowed in if they have a supported weapon type for the Quest.
column2: 只有任务支持该盟友的武器时，盟友才能加入。（特指斗技场）

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: Funny but buggy. Duplicates share a health pool, and if they aren't assigned different wepaons, you risk random crashes.
column2: 逆天整活，盟友共享同一个生命值，如果没有为他们分配不同的武器，会存在随机崩溃的风险。

开局彩鸟spiribird_spawn: The Palamutes will spawn back in if you mount a Palamute yourself, to keep pace. They will despawn when you are back on foot.
column2: 如果你自己携带了牙猎犬，MOD会重新生成一个，以保证盟友跟随。如果你取消骑乘，牙猎犬会消失。
